Date: Monday, 8/18/1992
Subject: Progress of Brad Woodall
Dear Sir,
Brad Woodall is doing pretty good at A Frederick Keys!
He has an ERA of 3.72, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
